title: Plant Heat Tolerance Database
text:
This site accompanies the data paper:
XYZ
The dataset includes 3,000+ records of heat tolerance traits across 1,700+ plant taxa.




Download the dataset
Link to the paper




We welcome data submissions of plant heat tolerances from other scientists. If you’d like to share your data to this public data set, follow the instructions:


Please use the template below to format your data correctly: Download CSV Template



Once your CSV is ready, please upload it via this secure Google Form link.
Submissions will be periodically reviewed and merged into the main database for all to access.




If you use this dataset, please cite:

XYZ., et al. (2025). A database of plant heat tolerances. Journal XYZ. DOI: xxx




This dataset is a synthesis of data extracted from published academic literature. All trait values are attributed to their original sources as documented in the database.
